text: mesēma sǣma nabivarayāṭama minisungenda, jinvarungenda æti ṣeyitānvarunva api saturan bavaṭa pat kara tibuṇemu. ovungen samaharek samaharekuva ravaṭanu piṇisa alaṁkāravat (boru) vadan (kaṇhi) rahasin pavasā (visuruvā harimin) siṭiyaha. obagē deviyan adahas kara tibunē nam, mesē ovun kara tikhennaṭa iḍa næta. ebævin (nabiyē!) oba ovunvada, ovungē boru kiyamanda hæra damanu
